# About
This is code assistance agent that help you refactor, edit, delete, move, your code.
It was create for education purpose by learnin goodle development agent kit.
Currently only run on Antropic llm model.

# Feature
- Read folder structure
- Write AI code
- Edit files
- Create Files
- Delete files

# How to run
```
python -m venv env
source env/bin/activate
pip install -r requirements
python .
```
